blindme.command.effect_already_set: This is the currently active effect
blindme.command.effect_already_unset: There already isn't an effect set specifically for this world
blindme.command.current.none: The is no effect currently active
blindme.options.title: BlindMe Settings
blindme.options.world_effect.tooltip.BLI: Blindness: Blocks and entities are only visible in a small radius
blindme.options.world_effect.tooltip.DAR: Darkness: Blocks and entities are visible in a medium radius
blindme.options.world_effect.tooltip.def: Default: use the effect set as default for all worlds
blindme.options.disable_darkness_pulse.t: Removes the pulsing effect from Darkness when it's applied by BlindMe
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.blindme: A client-sided mod that enforces the Blindness effect on the player, configurable per world.
